website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel-Quickwalk 3 is a lightweight and comfortable walking shoe that received general acclaim from consumers. The highlights of the footwear included its stylish design, true-to-size measurement, supportive midsole, and plantar fasciitis-related pain relief. However, it earned the ire of a few critics for its narrow toe box, substandard tread, and insufficient arch support. Overall, the trainer was deemed as a great walking shoe for long periods of activity.
pros: The Asics Gel-Quickwalk 3 was comfortable for everyday walking, according to a majority of reviewers
Many buyers liked the stylish aesthetics of the shoe
The footwear’s snug fit received plenty of compliments from the purchasers
Several users praised the support that the midsole provided
The trainer was good for those suffering from plantar fasciitis, based on some feedback
A few consumers appreciated its lightweight nature
cons: Numerous wearers complained about the shoe’s uncomfortable build
A lot of people found the toe box to be too narrow
A small number of owners reported that the tread easily wore off
Some reviewers felt that the shoe had inadequate arch support

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & great support!!
customer_reviews.text: I power walk on the treadmill doing between 3 to 5 miles a day. This is my second pair of Asics gel quickwalk. Love them for my feet. I have tried so many other but to me these are the best for my feet. Run true to size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: I loved the Gel-Quickwalk 2 Asics and thought I would like ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs very small. Depending on the shoe, I wear a 6.5 or a 7. In walking shoes I always buy a 7. I've had several pairs of Asics in the past, always a 7, but in this shoe I had to return for a 7.5 and even with that the toe box was still to tight. I loved the Gel-Quickwalk 2 Asics and thought I would like this one, but there's no comparison. I walk 5 miles a day and this shoe killed my feet. I wore it for 3 days and gave it to my daughter-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: AZSun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes great for a 12+ hour work day. Only shoes that are comfortable for me. Fast Shipping.!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: These walking shoes ARE NOT comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ASICS walking shoe because I had bought one a year ago and it fit perfect on the first try. I didn't have to break them in. I had bought T5N8N, F820215-FV and they were perfect. These are Q750N, F910518-BJ and I've tried to break them in with NO luck. I did write to them with the problem but I haven't gotten an answer. Once they have your money... too bad so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that they were too small. My toe was right at the end of the shoe, and I know I ordered the correct size. Also, the stripes on the side were "painted" on, not a part of the shoe. I didn't notice that in the pictures, but I didn't really like it. I'll be shopping for shoes in stores from now on. However, I'm thankful for Amazon's great return policy!
customer_reviews.author: cemillard

customer_reviews.title: Too snug
customer_reviews.text: Wife is returning these shoes, she walks a lot in her job and needs a less snug fit. She also states there is not as much arch support as with the Reebocks she ordered at the same time. Keeping the Reebocks and returning the Asics for another pair of Reebocks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit  & Amazingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have ASICS running shoes and they were comfortable even though I’m not a runner. I bought them at a discount store months ago and didn’t know they were “running shoes”, becau there was no identification tag. So, I saw my Shoes 👟 “-running shoes” on Amazon, so I then saw these ASICS Gel Quick walk, and they are great. I can tell the difference that they are for walking and love these ASICS GREAT fit, hugs my feet and I’m able to walk in these 5 hours no problems
customer_reviews.author: Greta Snowden

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the stripes are painted on. I have worn them a few times. They are great. I ordered my regular size with the last ones I ordered and had to return them. This time I ordered half size up. They fit with just enough space for my toes to not get squished when I am dragged down the street by my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Naja

customer_reviews.title: ASICIS Womens Gel-Quickwalk 3 Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this shoe. I ordered a half-size larger as their shoes are always narrow in the front even though you order a medium width. It just doesn't fit right. The shoe on the left foot slips in and out when I walk. I don't know what has happened to ASICS in the past few years as their products have really declined in quality. I decided not to buy anymore ASICS brand shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Liloa

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I like Asics best of all the tennis shoes for me. I wear 11N but need an orthotic in one shoe that lifts the inside so much to the outside it take a deep lace up shoe to stabilize my ankle. (too much info I know) So I usually have to buy a medium width to accommodate the insert for one shoe. The right shoe of these worked great for that but the left shoe was so wide, etc, etc, etc, Couldn't make it work. Returned them but got another identical pair from Dicks that worked, go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are like my men: snug, comfy, supportive
customer_reviews.text: I just got them, so we'll see how they hold up, but as a dog walker, these shoes have so far been perfect. My back feels supported, and stepping into them feels like putting on a pillow. It is a snug fit, so if you're looking for shoes that breathe well, these may not be the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: ArielE

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, order one size up they run narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I ordered a size larger because my feet do swell and I do use these for exercise walks in the Texas heat. The shoe runs a bit narrow, but I want a stable shoe that hold and supports my foot well and this one fit that bill. It has nice cushy heels which helps with the platar fachia issues and it breathes really well minimizing foot sweat. Overall, if you want to do some serious walking, this is a very good shoe for it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: wore them for 2 hours today to break them in and my feet ached a little when I sat still but when I walked they were amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: the size fits to a t but the shoe is a little tight on the sides. wore them for 2 hours today to break them in and my feet ached a little when I sat still but when I walked they were amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Crampy
customer_reviews.text: Seems like sneakers are getting more narrow in toes! I have very skinny feet and I can still state that they are very narrow! I also bought medium and a half size larger than normal because I knew they would be skimping on the toe area! Not just this brand but every brand I’ve tried in past 2 years! Charge they same but make them smaller! Thanks for cramping my toes! I would have given 5 stars if they were a better fit! They are comfortable but can not wear thick socks! UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Nan.C

customer_reviews.title: Okay sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not wear walking specific sneakers. I wear other types of flat shoes or sneakers, but developed some PF and heel issues. I have a very narrow foot and the shoes feel a bit clunky. If you're feet are normal or wide, then I do not think they would look clunky at all. They are more level than neutral running shoes, but for heel pain issues, they aren't super cushioning. I use a heel cushion sometimes but even that isn't always comfortable. I guess it depends if you have foot issues or not as to how comfortable these will be.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 size shoe. There's no way around how big my feet are, with that said I look for shoes that don't make my feet bigger than they are. This shoe is perfect. They don't make my feet look big and they are comfortable. I bought this shoe for work. I've had this product for two weeks now and I'm still satisfied. I don't feel any pain or pressure on my heel anymore. I'd definitely recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: got2havekayah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I held onto my last pair of athletic shoes way too long and had forgotten how wonderful it is to have a nice high quality shoe. I just completed a 2.14 mile walk and did it on clouds! :) My feet were comfortable but also my legs, hips and back are thanking me too for this new pair of shoes. I generally fit into 7.5-8 regular width and since my feet tend to swell a bit during a walk I bought an 8 and they fit well. No painful rubbing on the heel and I worried that my first walk might rub uncomfortably but they didn’t. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but slippery!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable but if your shoe is the slightest bit wet (like after walking across a wet parking lot) be VERY careful when you step on tile/wood floors. I have wiped out twice already. The bottoms are very smooth which is fine on pavement but not so great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Powers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 9 and my feet are a bit on the wide side; however, in anticipation of walking a bunch, I ordered a 9.5 and they fit perfectly. Went on a two mile walk without breaking them in and didn’t have a single issue. I would buy these again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kety

customer_reviews.title: ASICS are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great, supportive shoe. I recently developed plantar fasciitis, and thes shoes conform exactly to my podiatrist’s guidelines
customer_reviews.author: ANNE GRASSER

customer_reviews.title: Not a walking shoe...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Runs a little small; so I did as reviews suggested and ordered 1/2 size larger, glad I did. I am a retired RN. I would NOT wear these to work in. Soles are thin, not cushy. I could barely feel the gel at all. They are touted as a "walking shoe." They are light weight, for sure. I did not care particularly for the color, but was not given any other choice. From the description, I thought it would be a thicker sole and give much more cushion and protection. Not worth the money. Something of equal quality could be found in Walmart for much less money.
customer_reviews.author: Sewmedown

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Shoes have serious quality problems: the same size, different lengths, different widths, insoles one big and one small. I have never seen such an outrageous product quality, customer service is still not willing to unconditionally refund, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CHEN YAN

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and short
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started having pain in my right foot and chose these because they’re recommended for plantar fasciitis. These shoes are narrow and weirdly too short. I normally buy a size 9, I can wear an 8 &1/2 but I like more room for my toes. I don’t have an especially wide foot, these are terrible. I’m not sure if all ASICS fit this way, these were my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: great for walking class
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe based upon opinions of people in my "Walk with Ease class" sponsored by the arthritis foundation. 4 people in the class wore them. The shoe runs small as noted by other people who wrote up comments. So I ordered a full size up from my normal 9 and a half size to a 10 and a half size. It fit perfectly! Very comfortable fit and cushy bottoms. I walked a mile right away to break them in. Then biked 6 miles at the gym. I am 78 years old and have worn many athletic shoes in the past. I have many issues in my feet. Very, Very happy with the gel quik walk3 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey j. straup

customer_reviews.title: ASICS...  NOT LOVIN' THIS PAIR
customer_reviews.text: Asics have been my go to athletic shoe for over 20 years. They have always instantly fit my feet, large toe box and great arch support. I am disappointed with this pair as the right shoe seems to be just a tad shorter than the left one. They also look and feel bulkie, like there is extra padding where it's not needed. I will wear them again and try to get past the break in period... but, not loving this pair!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny D.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable ever~
customer_reviews.text: OMG - what a great deal on these shoes - they are super comfortable - light and supportive. And they are cute too. I ordered an 8.5 and it fit perfectly (I wear an 8 typically but in boots and athletic shoes I always order a half size up for toe box comfort)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great. I love ASICS Gel since High School track
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. I love ASICS Gel since High School track, but as a adult I moved away to other types of sneakers but I kept having knee issues. After years, I decided to pay the money and try a pair again. Well, my knees are happy and for my foot shape these still are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If they fit right, you can't find a better sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and have worn them including backless sneakers. I can walk 3 miles in a snap. When I injured my foot, the sneakers were the only things I could wear because they were wide enough. Sadly, the latest pair I ordered are narrow. They are supposed to be the exact same sneaker. IDK. The return time has expired so I will keep them for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Asics standards
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my favorite Asics walking shoes. So disappointed with these. They look fine, felt good for the first couple of walks, but it took 3 weeks for a callous to stop hurting and longer for it to go away. My old Asics are pretty shot and they still feel better than these. Looks were deceiving😕
customer_reviews.author: Coastal reading

customer_reviews.title: Asics fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a shoe I love. It is comfortable and supportive. Fits well and Asics is a brand I trust. Still a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: clayday

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the narrow side and toe box itself could be roomier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this style ASICS and the Gel-Venture 7 at the same time. This style is visibly narrower than the Gel-Venture 7 although both are a bit on the narrow side. I normally wear a size 8.5 M but am going to return both for 8.5 W. Otherwise appear well made and stylish. The test though is to wear them to see how long they last or if they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 wide, but these fit fine at medium width. Just took a couple of days to break them in. I would not have wanted to have a wide width. They would have ended up being too big. Only thing is that, on me, the heel is just a little wide. But they are wearable. When you have very hard to fit feet like mine, these are good shoes to have.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Mead

customer_reviews.title: Length as expected, diameter a big snug
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 1/2 size, wide width usually, and the fit in length was as expected. I admit that they do feel snug wrapped around the feet, but that may get better as I break them in. Update: on the 5th time I wore them they fit a little better...not as tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K TownsendTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: it moves to the side and it doesn't look good.
customer_reviews.text: I worked 12 hrs a day for 3 days and never had a problem with the shoes. I just wish its a little wider. My problem with this shoes is the tongue, it moves to the side and it doesn't look good.
customer_reviews.author: Ella D

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fit and comfort of these shoes. Price was a little more than I wanted to pay but I wanted a quality shoe and I feel I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy a half size larger. Ran smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a half size larger. I always buy 11.5 women's size and had to return them for a size 12 I went with a different style as these were a little too bulky for my taste. I love Asics and would buy these again if there were no other options in my size though. I didn't get to break them in because I immediately felt them snug.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vest

customer_reviews.title: Feet in the clouds.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. This is my first pair of gel shoe. They actually make my feet feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Landreth

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: At least a half size smaller than stated, plus is a narrow width when it should have been medium width.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C.

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are not too tight. The only thing that isn't perfect, is they feel a little tight in the heel over a period of time. I am using them for speed walking, and stopped wearing them all day long. They serve their purpose. I no longer wobble when I speed walk.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I had read a lot of good reviews about these shoes but I do not find them comfortable or attractive in person. I meant to return them but forgot and now it's too late. I also bought the size I normally wear and they're too small. I ended up by a pair of Sketchers which I wear every day and in the meantime these will either sit in my closet or will be donated.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great support reduces pain in lower back and hips
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe but runs a little small. I usually wear 8.5 or 9 depending on how the shoe is made. I am exchanging these for a size 9. I do a lot of standing and the hour I had the shoes on I noticed less pain in back and hips. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This show was not comfortable to walk in. It is the most stylish walking sandal that’s i have found, but it is not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kemrad

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I would never ever recommend this item . I am a normal width size 8 person . For me the toe area is very uncomfortable and too tight to walk. It’s not at all comfortable. I used it outside once and so couldn’t return it .
customer_reviews.author: Shivi

customer_reviews.title: Great walkers.
customer_reviews.text: My feet have been hurting for awhile so I ordered these shoes so see if they would help. I do a lot of walking with my dog. Since I have been using them my feet have improved and the pain has subsided. I am very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: pwarko

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of the ASICS Gel 3 Walking shoe I've ordered online. The first pair were great. Fit right out of the box and were always comfortable. I've been walking in this pair for about two weeks, at least 2 miles everyday, and they are still not comfortable. I had sore spots starting out that have minimized, but I've never had the 'aaah' moment with this pair. I won't be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They fit 2 sizes too small. Had to return. I sure wish they would have fit because the previous version of these were wonderful and I was hoping the same for these.
customer_reviews.author: Faelan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were very cheaply made - paint instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very cheaply made - paint instead of stitching or plastic stripes. They were also too short and too tight - even though they were the same size as my other 3 pairs of Asics. I suspect they may be knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been having foot and ankle pain, and this shoe has helped. I can make it most days on my feet without the discomfort I was feeling before. Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Is ASICS is making more narrow?
customer_reviews.text: Love the ASICS brand, but the toe box seems to be getting more narrow. These are working out well, but seem a bit tight after a few hours in the toe box area.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: These are great walking shoes. I walk about 5-6 miles a day and they are supportive yet light. I wish they were available in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: MA teacher

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: ASICS continues to be a brand of choice for me. This is my first “walking shoe” from ASICS. I usually need orthotics for walking, but these fit like a charm and performed satisfactorily right out of the box. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Owens

customer_reviews.title: Sizes have changed??
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are always very reliable. I walk a lot, and they last me 4-6 months with great support. The last pair I bought was shorter than the other 5-6 pair I'd had, and I had to get a half-size bigger. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Esther D. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow in toe
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 but the 8 was way too tight in the toe and it slipped off my heel. I also did not feel the gel cushioning when walking.
customer_reviews.author: watssup1

customer_reviews.title: Not quite up to the ASICS standard
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was smaller than other ASICS that I've worn and the quality wasn't as good as the ASICS I ordered a few days later. I did return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe that does the entire body good. I can walk all day and still feel refreshed at the end of the day. If you have a job standing on your feet all day or do a lot of walking, ASIC shoes are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney walking!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes! Very comfortable and they fit perfectly, I am a 7.5. When other friends were spending $200+ on the ‘best walking shoes’, I am happy to have gotten these for $65 and they were perfect for Disney walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: For a medium width shoe I would say they have a narrow width. I wanted to give ASICS a try but these did not work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. I need to break them in, like the rest of my ASICS shoes. I have been walking daily, 7 days, 3 times a day for 9 years. I only wear ASICS shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeane Hand

customer_reviews.title: Runs at least a size too small
customer_reviews.text: I always wear Asics and was happy to order these shoes for walking. I bought the size I always buy, when they arrived they are super cute buy at least a size (or more) too small. Thankfully the vendor graciously accepted the return.
customer_reviews.author: KrissieB

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the best walking sneakers I’ve purchased. Very comfortable for walking for a 12 hour day which is what I purchased them for. Feet weren’t tired after a long day of wearing them. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs a comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to order a half size larger for best fit. Once I learned that, these are a great shoe and perfect for my high arches!
customer_reviews.author: Amy June

customer_reviews.title: Have bought same brand many times & they always fit perfectly. This pair feels like a size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same brand many times and they always fit perfectly this pair feels like it’s a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Vanna Land

customer_reviews.title: I found the heel bigger than I liked. I’ve only worn them twice and they feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and a very narrow heel; I found the heel bigger than I liked. I’ve only worn them twice and they feel stiffer than other ASICS I’ve worn. I’m not sure they have enough cushion for me as I spend 4+hours a day walking on concrete floors. I thought they were good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Starbuck

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot. These provide decent support and are comfortable from the start. Asics are my new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: southernbugg

customer_reviews.title: Gel was not goof
customer_reviews.text: Gel was misleading. Insoles were very flat and uncomfortable. I had to buy gel insoles for plantar fasciitis for them to be tolerable for walking. I walk 3-4 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reed

customer_reviews.title: Asics gel - the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5 mi a day walker. I have always loved the Asics gel from my running days. They do run a bit small tho. I had to send back a 6 and re-order a 6.5. But the half size bigger is perfect. The shipping and return process was fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Melody M.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: I use these to wear when walking my dogs. We walk a paved path and sometimes dirt path, the shoes do not provide enough support to be classified walking shoes. I know that I didn't pay a lot of money for this particular shoe, my brand of choice for walking shoes/tennis shoes is ASICS so I thought I was getting a good deal for a pair of walking shoes. I guess it's easy to say, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: First pair fit my right foot like a glove
customer_reviews.text: left foot is slightly larger than right. First pair fit my right foot like a glove, (having problems with my right heel), but left shoe too short. Had to re-order in 1/2 size larger to fit left foot. Still good, but need to have 1/2 smaller on the right. Walk every morning for a mile with the dog & the shoes are working out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: patty peterr

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and styles
customer_reviews.text: Asicsc is by far the best athletic shoes on the market, great fit, very comfortable, great colors and styles
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J.

customer_reviews.title: I have bought several pairs of ASICS from Amazon in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of ASICS from Amazon in a size 7 and all have fit perfectly. Unfortunately these ones were way to tight and I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow in toe area
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for every day shoes, for walking. They were narrow in the toe area and I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Women acics shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have bought similar shoe before . Product apparently had been shipped to another buyer and returned and shipped to us; right shoe had a defect and did not fit properly; returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $$$$
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have ZERO support! I had to buy Dr Scholl’s inserts. For $65, I shouldn’t have had to spend more $. I’ve been working out for 4 decades & these are worst shoes I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Lapham

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive these shoes but when I tried them they were too small! I was vet surprised since I ordered the same size as my current ASICS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This are great shoes. I normally have no problem with then but this pair ran to small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Problem with insoles.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased ASICS in the past and love them but this pair has an issue with the arch support. It causes pain when I walk. My other pair did not do that. I think these must be seconds. They came from Zappos so that could be the problem. And although they looked great they’re just not comfortable. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the way they fit and much cheaper than the Nb I bought last year. Need support for my feet and this are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for just plain old WALKING
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! ASICS are my favs anyway and these walking shoes are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I had to go up 1/2 size. The shoe is a little narrow. Overall though I am very happy with the shoe for walking. It is a very pretty shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I always have to order a 1/2 size up in Asics. I already knew that though, so the pair I purchased was perfect. I can walk all day in them without feeling tired and achy.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking and a nice cushion inside. Has good support but tends to pinch the toes after wearing them for a full day. Need to give the feet a rest.
customer_reviews.author: bzbubby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, true to size
customer_reviews.text: They fix just right. The shoe looks nice, Navy, lavender with white sole. The gray outline is a little more cheap looking in my opinion but not too bad. I'm healing from a foot injury and these feel very supportive. Already feeling an improvement from getting a pair of these walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I walked all over Disney World in these and my feet didn't ache at all!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Reda

customer_reviews.title: Bit tight out of the box, but fit perfect now
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit tight when I first got them, but after about 10 miles, they fit perfectly. I bought my street shoe size. They're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MommyRox

customer_reviews.title: could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.text: Was soooo excited to get these shoes. Cute & priced right. These are fairly well ventilated, could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Not the ASICS I Love
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased to replace a pair of ASICS shoes the same size. The toe box on these is much smaller than my current pair. I did like the navy color but not the painted on trim.
customer_reviews.author: TTH

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, great pair of walking shoes right out of the box. Love the navy colour with the pop pink.
customer_reviews.author: Chunk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I am always nervous when buying shoes online. These fit perfectly and the support was in the perfect places. I took a 3 mile walk today in them and they were super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This is a good walking shoe. I'm very happy with this purchase and will shop again for more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: jeaniew

customer_reviews.title: Jump Into the ASICS Gel-Quickwalk 3
customer_reviews.text: These ASICs are of fine quality and feel so good on. The fit is perfect, the shoe is perfect and the price is very reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Spectacular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoe! This is my second pair and hopefully they will be around when I need new ones
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Tanenholz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the toes. Good shoes for indoor workout.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Dell

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Love Asics, always correct fit at the right price. Delivery on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Just ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not feeling any added support for walking. Not a bad shoe, just ok
customer_reviews.author: Monaei B

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Shoe Fit
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes but are a little small in the fit for a size 9 shoe. Will keep and try to break-in. The service and shipping is always the quality that is what I can count on in any order from Amazon. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand before , and it is not what I expected! These hurt my feet and I had to order a size larger because they were too small !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Asics shoes and this one fills the void of mine hunt for a navy shoe. It came well packed and in good order.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more support with these. They are a little narrow in the toe box, too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miczek

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take on and off, moderate support for 5-8 mile walking at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit real well, I walk 2 to 4 miles a day and so far they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's Gel-Quickwalk 3 Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Our third incarnation of this entry-level walking shoe marries a Rear foot GEL Technology cushioned midsole and a newly redesigned upper. Available in both mesh and synthetic leather uppers, the new GEL-Quick walk 3 shoe brings value and performance together in one great looking shoe.
